channel.title: NoteFlow on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in NoteFlow on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: NoteFlow: Prototyping with AI Speed
item.description: During my final days with bolt.new, I built two exciting prototypes—NoteFlow and MD-Editor-PRO—using the remaining tokens. Inspired by my feature-rich Final Year Project in polytechnic, NoteFlow revisits the joy of music tech, now made faster with modern tools. In this post, I walk through building, deploying, and demoing both projects on Netlify.
